name: DEMO: Photo Galleries (NBC Task)
description: This demo is the task I was given for the NBC interview. It mentions the creation of a page with the ability to view a list of galleries, a single gallery with all of its photos, and the ability to view a single photo. Users should also be able to navigate between galleries, and photos.

name: DEMO: Photo Gallery 1 (NBC Task)
description: This demo is the task I was given for the NBC interview. Direct link to gallery 1.

name: DEMO: Photo Gallery 2 (NBC Task)
description: This demo is the task I was given for the NBC interview. Direct link to gallery 2.

name: DEMO: Photo Gallery 3 (NBC Task)
description: This demo is the task I was given for the NBC interview. Direct link to gallery 3.

name: REST API: List of NBC Galleries (NBC Task)
description: Returns a json document with a list of galleries, their name and url.

name: REST API: NBC Gallery Info (1) (NBC Task)
description: Returns a json document with information about gallery with id: 1. Info comes from local galleries data.

name: REST API: NBC Gallery Data (1) (NBC Task)
description: Returns a json document with a the entire gallery json for gallery with id: 1. Info comes from remote NBC source.

name: REST API: List of NBC Photos (1) (NBC Task)
description: Returns a json document with a local gallery info.

name: REST API: List of NBC Photos (1) (NBC Task)
description: Returns a json document with a list of gallery photos, from remote data source.
